name: Ferra
description:
Battle the spirits of militarized landscaping tools in this frenetic entry to Boss Rush Jam 2023!

By Toffee (programming, art https://raru.re/@toffy) and Miredly (music, sfx, programming https://raru.re/@miredly)

This was made as an exploration into Monogame, a framework we're both completely new to. Because of this, and us both having full-time commitments, the game is a little humble and limited. Please let us know in the comments if you enjoyed it, if it felt OK, and if there are any bugs!

Thanks so much to the hosts of this jam!
